Basic Function: Calculate the amount of alcohol in grams in a drink by entering the volume amount and alcohol content (v/v, as stated on the label). 

Usage: Enter data (any 2 data fields, just tap on them). Tapping "Calculate" computes the contained amount of alcohol in grams. "Clear" clears the data fields. In principle, any 2 data points result in calculation of the third one (like volume in milliliter for given amount of alcohol (g) and content (v/v). 

Additional Function: After the first calculation, you can also change individual fields. Other relevant fields will then be automatically calculated.
